PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01382018-02-12,  ,  ,  ,  ISED,  NRC,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Research Council Canada to ENTER INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employee's Association for all employees in the Computer Systems Administration Group (CS). This is a four (4) year agreement from December 22, 2014 to 21 December 2018, pursuant to Section 112 of the FEDERAL PUBLIC SECTOR LABOUR RELATIONS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
